p.s: The given scene from the movie The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr. and published in 2018 deals with the introduction of Chris and his importance for Starr.
The scene takes place at the beginning of the movie.
It's the first time we (the audience) see Starr at school and furthermore the first time that we get to know Chris.
In the beginning of the scene we see Chris going through the school hall shaking hands with his friends and having earphones at his neck.
He goes straight to Starr who is getting books from her locker.
Chris puts his earphones on Starr's head and plays a new song he wrote for Starr.
But Starr wants to prevent herself feeling happy with Chris, because she is still mad at him because of condom-gate.
She takes the earphones ofoff and the both talk about the difficulties in their relationship.
Chris wants to come closer to Starr, while she needs distance but still wants to be a couple with Chris.
At the end of the scene Chris turns on his new remix loud dancing to it on the school hall.
After a few seconds Starr comes laughing to him going in a side room with him.
